casebody.data:
NATIONAL LIFE & ACCIDENT INSURANCE COMPANY, Incorporated, v. Rubie E. WATERS. No. 3262. Circuit Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. July 15, 1946. Biddison & Rheam, of Tulsa, Okl., for cross-appellant. Marvin T. Johnson, of Tulsa, Okl., for cross-appellee.

Before PHILLIPS, BRATTON, and HUXMAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Cross-appeal dismissed on authority of opinion in Rubie E. Waters v. National Life & Accident Insurance Co., Inc., 10 Cir., 156 F.2d 470.
